>
[Rat Familiar](/Feats.aspx?ID=1297) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ratfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=234" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 22 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You have a pet rat that has become magically bonded to you. You gain a [familiar](/familiar-abilities) using the rules [here](/Rules.aspx?ID=160), and this familiar must be a rat. It still gets the benefits of familiar abilities, but its base form remains a rat.
